title: help with font. :)
content:
hi all!  
i wanted to see if anyone could help me identify this font? thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131112202im_/http:/typophile.com/files/H479~Vogue-May-15-1941-Posters_5434.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [H479~Vogue-May-15-1941-Posters.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131112202/http:/typophile.com/files/H479~Vogue-May-15-1941-Posters.jpg) | 38.36 KB |
author: juliet

comments.content: I'm sure this was all lettering. But if you are looking for something similar to Vogue you might look at the [Bleumlein](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131112202/http:/search.veer.com/bleumlein) collection for something similar.
